Z vozilom trčil v črpalko za točenje goriva
Plačati bo moral globo.
07 Nov 2019, 14:21 by A. L.
VRTOJBA – Prometni policisti so v ponedeljek ob 19.10 obravnavali prometno nesrečo na bencinskem servisu na hitri cesti v Vrtojbi (območje nekdanjega mednarodnega mejnega prehoda). Zgodila se je zaradi nepravilnega premika z vozilom voznika tovornega vozila s priklopnikom slovaških registrskih oznak.Policisti PU Nova Gorica so na kraju ugotovili, da je 49-letni voznik tovornega vozila, državljan Ukrajine, zaradi nepravilnega premika z vozilom trčil v črpalko za točenje goriva.Zaradi odgovornosti za storitev prekrška po zakonu o pravilih cestnega prometa (kršitev določil 42. člena ZPrCP) so mu izrekli globo, so še zapisali v poročilu.
text:
He collided with the vehicle in the fuel pump
He will have to pay a fine.
07 Nov 2019, 14:21 by A.L.
VRTOJBA - Traffic police officers on Monday addressed a car accident at a service station on the expressway in Vrtojba (the area of the former international border crossing) at 19.10. It occurred because of an improper movement of a truck with a Slovak license plate trailer. Police officers of the Nova Gorica Police Department found that a 49-year-old Ukrainian truck driver had collided with a vehicle at a refueling pump. He was fined for liability for committing a misdemeanor under the Road Traffic Act (violation of the provisions of Article 42 of the ZPrCP), the report added.
